schoolName: The First High School of Shang Hang
description: I majored in science subject in my high school, served as the League branch secretary, and received the top ten grades in my class for my academic achievements.

My major is computer science and technology. I earned a good GPA due to my diligent study. My exceptional comprehensive score earned me a recommendation to pursue master's-level studies at Zhejiang University without taking exams.
I'm a student of software engineering, and I like researching in the topic of visualization. I'm aiming to read and publish scientific articles in order to strengthen my research skills.
